com.mongodb
Class Java5MongoConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.util.SimplePool<DBPort>
      com.mongodb.DBPortPool
          com.mongodb.Java5MongoConnectionPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
Java5MongoConnectionPoolMBean
Deprecated. This class will be removed in 3.x versions of the driver, so please remove it from your compile time dependencies. 

@Deprecated
 class Java5MongoConnectionPool
extends DBPortPool
implements Java5MongoConnectionPoolMBean

This class exists only so that on Java 5 the driver can create instances of a standard MBean, therefore keeping compatibility with the JMX implementation in the Java 5 JMX class libraries.
